member.name: T:VendingMachines.VendingMachine
member.summary: The class which is used to represent a vending machine.

member.name: F:VendingMachines.VendingMachine.bagSize
member.summary: The size of a bag of food used to refill the vending machine.

member.name: F:VendingMachines.VendingMachine.maxFoodStock
member.summary: The amount of food that the vending machine can hold (in pounds).

member.name: F:VendingMachines.VendingMachine.moneyBox
member.summary: The money box of the vending machine.

member.name: F:VendingMachines.VendingMachine.foodStock
member.summary: The amount of food currently in stock (in pounds).

member.name: M:VendingMachines.VendingMachine.#ctor(System.Decimal,MoneyCollectors.IMoneyCollector)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the VendingMachine class.

member.name: P:VendingMachines.VendingMachine.MoneyBalance
member.summary: Gets the money balance of the vending machine.

member.name: M:VendingMachines.VendingMachine.AddMoney(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Adds money to the vending machine.
member.param: The amount of money to be added.

member.name: M:VendingMachines.VendingMachine.BuyFood(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Buys food from the vending machine.

member.name: M:VendingMachines.VendingMachine.DetermineFoodPrice(System.Double)
member.summary: Determines the price of food for an animal of a specified weight.
member.param: The weight of the animal for which to determine food price.
member.returns: The price for the amount of food required to sufficiently feed an animal of the specified weight.

member.name: M:VendingMachines.VendingMachine.RemoveMoney(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Removes money from the vending machine.
member.param: The amount of money to be removed from the vending machine.
member.returns: Returns the amont of money left in the vending machine.

member.name: M:VendingMachines.VendingMachine.AddFoodBag
member.summary: Add a bag of food to the vending machine.

member.name: M:VendingMachines.VendingMachine.IsFull
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether or not the vending machine is full.
member.returns: A value indicating whether or not the vending machine is full.
